**Dumbarton House is closed for the foreseeable future for an HVAC overhaul.**

**We’ll miss you—stay tuned for updates!**

[Dive deep into the three-hundred year history of Dumbarton House.These walls have stories to tell... And of course, beautiful historic wallpaper to showoff!History Lessons](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114132301/https://dumbartonhouse.org/category/education/)

[Explore Past ExhibitsInterested in exhibits not currently on display at Dumbarton House? Check out our past work here!View Past Exhibits](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114132301/https://dumbartonhouse.org/power-in-preservation/)

[Do you like art, cooking, or technology?Whatever you enjoy, experience Dumbarton from a new perspective.View Current Programs](/web/20260114132301/https://dumbartonhouse.org/programs/)

## Join & Donate

Join us in our mission to promote historic preservation, educate the public on early American history, and enhance the cultural life of our nation’s capital.

[ Ways to Give ](/web/20260114132301/https://dumbartonhouse.org/about/join-and-donate/)
